post:
Hello LET :)

We just launched a OVHcloud / So you Start Deals

25 Feb to 5 March 3PM (Paris timezone, GMT+1)


**Dedicated servers**


**OVH offers**

Special edition servers (= recurring pricing).
No setup fees.

https://www.ovh.ie/dedicated_servers/rise/prices/
https://www.ovh.com/world/dedicated-servers/rise/prices/


**Rise-LE-1**

Intel Xeon E5-1620v2 (4c / 8t - 3,7GHz / 3,9GHz)
64GB DDR3 ECC 1600Mhz (error on website which display 1333Mhz)
SoftRAID 2x4TB SATA
**54.99€**

Available in FR / CA  datacenters

**Rise-LE-2**

Intel Xeon E3-1270v6 (4c / 8t - 3,8GHz / 4,2GHz)
32GB DDR4 ECC 2133Mhz (error on website which display 1333Mhz)
SoftRAID 2x4TB SATA + 2x450GB SSD NVMe
**74.99€**

Available in FR / PL / UK / CA datacenters
